pkgmetadata.longdescription: # maquinas_maquinas_ is a library to build computing machines and grammars. It can be use to teach Formal Language Theory.## InstallationWithin a virtual environment use pip to install maquinas: $ pip install maquinas## DocumentationVisit: https://maquinas.readthedocs.io/To check further examples check the [Notebooks repository](https://github.com/ivanvladimir/maquinas_notebooks).
